name: Diego Colina
title: Senior Software Analyst, Paprika Software (ERP)
text: You can tell from session one that Eduardo knows what he is talking about and has years of experience in the field and he knows about more practical and job-related things.

name: Jessica Manturano
title: Frontend Developer, Freelancer
text: My session with Eduardo was highly valuable. He offered clear, personalized guidance and practical advice tailored to my goals, giving me a stronger sense of direction. I truly appreciated his strategic perspective and would definitely recommend him to anyone seeking career growth

name: Raquel Lores
title: Frontend Developer, Edison Next Spain
text: During our session, we reviewed my key expectations and explored strategies for professional growth. My mentor offered thoughtful, tailored recommendations that addressed my specific challenges and helped me define clear short- and mid-term objectives. He used practical examples that made his advice easier to understand and remember. His guidance also renewed my motivation to work on the areas I want to improve.

name: alaa hamed
title: Senior Frontend, Self
text: I had a great session with Eduardo, where he provided valuable insights on how to effectively present my skills and experience during interviews, and emphasized the importance of dedication when introducing myself; his advice has been incredibly helpful.

name: Dina Reda
title: Frontend Lead, /
text: Eduardo helped me identify the next level I should focus on to strengthen my skill baseline. He also provided valuable insights that have been incredibly helpful in preparing for my interviews.

name: Morco
title: Design System / UX Engineer, -
text: The meeting was very interesting and full of insights. It was very pleasant overall. Eduardo had a well organized and systematic approach for his mentorship session. Sadly, 45 min are not enough to discuss everything about the job search process, and time flies very fast when talking about the job market nowadays. ðŸ˜‚

name: Olabayoji Oladepo
title: Frontend Engineer, Waddle Insurance
text: My session with Eduardo was insightful. He was able to give valuable answers to some of the questions I had. His wealth of knowledge in his field is evident in how he communicates.

name: Leandro Oliveira
title: Mid Software Engineer, .
text: Eduardo helped me gain insights into career path possibilities. Based on his experience, he was honest about the benefits, trade-offs, and risks. I realized he is a real mentor and thoughtful person when he sent me a detailed note about everything we discussed, along with some extra materials. Furthermore he asked me if I wanted to continue to be a mentee.
